question:
Weekly Revenue Per Product Category at Office Supply Store X
Product Category
Weekly Revenue
Pens
$164
Pencils
$111
Legal pads
$199
Erasers
$38
Average (arithmetic mean) of categories above
$128
According to the chart above, the average (arithmetic mean) revenue per week per product category is $128. However, there is an error in the chart; the revenue for Pens is actually $176, not $164. What is the new, correct average revenue per week per product category?
(A) $130
(B) $131
(C) $132
(D) $164
(E) $176
